original_text: Jacob himself went in front of these groups. He bent down to the ground to respect Esau. He did this seven times as he came nearer to his brother.
korean_text: 자기는 그들 앞에서 나아가되 몸을 일곱 번 땅에 굽히며 그의 형 에서에게 가까이 가니

sentences.original_text: Jacob himself went in front of these groups.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱은 직접 이 무리들의 앞으로 나아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He bent down to the ground to respect Esau.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 에서를 존경하기 위해 땅에 몸을 굽혔습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did this seven times as he came nearer to his brother.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 형에게 다가가며 일곱 번 이렇게 했습니다.
